newsitem.title: GREECE: COMMERCIAL BANK OPENS NEW BRANCH IN THESSALONIKI.
newsitem.headline: COMMERCIAL BANK OPENS NEW BRANCH IN THESSALONIKI.

text.p: Commercial Bank of Greece, Greece's second largest state bank, said it opened a new branch in Thessaloniki, offering the full spectrum of its banking services and products.
Commercial's network of branches numbers 368, almost all fitted with ATMs.
Commercial has also installed 30 kiosks providing fully automated banking and foreign exchange services in remote tourist areas throughout Greece. --Angelos Kiosklis, Athens Newsroom +301 3311812-4
